class Enrolment_object(BaseOEAModule):
    def __init__(self, source_folder='enrolment', pseudonymize = True):
        BaseOEAModule.__init__(self, source_folder, pseudonymize)

        self.schemas['DMEnrolmentStatus'] = [
                                        ['SKEnrolmentStatus', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['BKEnrolmentStatusId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EnrolmentStatusDesc', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EnrolmentActive', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EnrolmentActiveYesNo', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EnrolmentGroup', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['BusinessDesc', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CreateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LastUpdateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveStartDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveEndDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['IsCurrent', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ScdReason', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['PrimarySort', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SecondarySort', 'double', 'no-op']                                                                  
                                        ]

        self.schemas['DMFactStudentEnrolment'] = [
                                        ['UIDEnrolmentId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SkEnrolmentYear', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKPreEnrolmentId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SkEnrolmentId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKStudent', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKPersistentStudentId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKGenderId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKCampus', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKDateEnrolmentSubmitted', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKDateEnrolmentStarted', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKDateEnrolmentEnded', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKEnrolmentStatus', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKYearLevel', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['FFPOS', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EslYesNo', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LboteYesNo', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKAtsi', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SwdYesNo', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKAttendanceStatusId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['StudentHeadCount', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CreateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveStartDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveEndDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['IsCurrent', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LastUpdateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EnrolmentCount', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EnrolmentFTE', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKMainCampus', 'integer', 'no-op']                                                           
                                        ]

        self.schemas['DMFactStudentEnrolmentCounts'] = [
                                        ['SKStudentEnrolmentCount', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKCampus', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKYearLevel', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKRollGroup', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKGenderId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKAtsi', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LBOTE_Int', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LBOTE_YesNo', 'string', 'no-op'], #converted varchar to string
                                        ['SKYear', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKDate', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['StudentCount', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['IsCurrent', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ReceivesESL_Int', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ReceivesESL_YesNo', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['RequiresESL_Int', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['RequiresESL_YesNo', 'string', 'no-op']                                                            
                                        ]

        self.schemas['DMFactSubjectEnrolment'] = [
                                        ['SKFactSubjectEnrolment', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKStudent', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKStaff', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKCampus', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKStudentOrganisationDetails', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKYearLevel', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKRollGroup', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKSubject', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKActivity', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CreateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveStartDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveEndDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LastUpdateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['IsCurrent', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EnrolmentCount', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKEnrolmentStartDate', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKEnrolmentEndDate', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKYear', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKSchoolTerm', 'integer', 'no-op']                                                                                                 
                                        ]
            

      

        self.schemas['DMPreEnrolment'] = [
                                        ['SKEnrolmentId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EnrolmentYear', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['BKSourceEnrolmentId', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['BKSourceStudentId', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['BKPersistentStudentId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKPreEnrolmentId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CampusId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['DateEnrolmentSubmitted', 'date', 'no-op'],
                                        ['DateEnrolmentStarted', 'date', 'no-op'],
                                        ['DateEnrolmentEnded', 'date', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EnrolmentStatusId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['YearLevelId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['FFPOS', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EslYesNo', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LboteYesNo', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['AtsiId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SwdYesNo', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CreateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveStartDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveEndDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['IsCurrent', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ScdReason', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LastUpdateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EnrolmentCount', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EnrolmentFTE', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['MainCampusId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['AttendanceStatus', 'integer', 'no-op']                                                                                                 
                                        ]

        self.schemas['DMPreEnrolmentId'] = [
                                        ['SKPreEnrolmentId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['BKSourceEnrolmentId', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CreateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LastUpdateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveStartDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveEndDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['IsCurrent', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ScdReason', 'string', 'no-op']                                                                                                  
                                        ]


        self.schemas['DMActivity'] = [
                                        ['SKActivity', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['BKActivity', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ActivityCode', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ActivityName', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['AcamademicYear', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Status', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SubjectCode', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['StartDateTime', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EndDateTime', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ManagingCompassPersonId', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['DefaultLocation', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ActivityType', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ActivityTypeDescription', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['AttendanceMode', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['AttendanceModeDescription', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['RunningStatus', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['RunningStatusDescription', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CampusId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CreateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LastUpdateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveStartDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveEndDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['IsCurrent', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ScdReason', 'string', 'no-op']
                                        ]

        self.schemas['DMSubject'] = [
                                        ['SKSubject', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['BKSubject', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['AcademicYear', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['AcademicYearName', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SubjectLongName', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SubjectShortName', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SubjectImportIdentifier', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Status', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SubjectYearLevel', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['FacultyImportIdentifier', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['FacultyLongName', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['FacultyShortName', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['FacultyStatus', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CreateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LastUpdateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveStartDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveEndDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Iscurrent', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SCDReason', 'string', 'no-op']
        ]

                             

    def ingest(self):
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMEnrolmentStatus', self.schemas['DMEnrolmentStatus'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKEnrolmentStatus')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMFactStudentEnrolment', self.schemas['DMFactStudentEnrolment'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'UIDEnrolmentId')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMFactStudentEnrolmentCounts', self.schemas['DMFactStudentEnrolmentCounts'], None, 'SKStudentEnrolmentCount')

        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMFactSubjectEnrolment', self.schemas['DMFactSubjectEnrolment'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKFactSubjectEnrolment')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMPreEnrolment', self.schemas['DMPreEnrolment'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKEnrolmentId')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMPreEnrolmentId', self.schemas['DMPreEnrolmentId'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKPreEnrolmentId')

        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMActivity', self.schemas['DMActivity'], None, 'SKActivity')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMSubject', self.schemas['DMSubject'], None, 'SKSubject')


enrolment_object = Enrolment_object()
